basics.name: Daniel Levy
basics.label: Machine Learning PhD Student
basics.summary: Machine Learning PhD student at McGill and Mila focused on generative AI, graph neural networks, and applications to physics, materials science, and chemistry. Theory-informed development of ML models and practical implementations; background in physics research and software engineering.
